name: Alone in the Grey
description:
Alone In The Grey is an adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

Move around using the WASD keys and move the camera using the mouse. Left click to interact and pick up objects. Right click to drop objects. Shift to run and ctrl to crouch.

This game was made by two developers as a fun project to work on and develop our skills.

William Hughes (Roxra) - Programming / Design - roxra.github.io

Liam Downton (Falconhead) - 3D Modelling / Art / Design

Sounds:
